title: 快去围观华春莹发言人的推特账号，下边一片乳华（春莹）的欢乐海洋（更新：华春莹给乳包言论点赞）
contents:

第二条：

On Feb. 13, Chancellor Merkel met with State Councilor Wang Yi in Berlin. She believes China will triumph over the epidemic and China will always have her support. "Ich wünsche China Kraft! 💪" (Go, China! ) Thank you Chancellor! We also believe we'll prevail. ❤️ 

https://t.co/YR3N9XM69T
